NAME: Biswarup Dutta
ABOUT: Flexible and analytical with a keen eye for details.Ability to work as individual as well as in group. Excellent communication skills both in written and verbal.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: FII and its Impact on Indian Stock Market
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: The content of the project is on how the Foreign Institution Investment causes fluctuation on stock prices. A detailed qualitative analysis is done based on different results with data of the period between 2000-2010.

Objective : To rank the riskiness of customers who are already in book with the bank for atleast 6 months by predicting the probability of default of the customers over the next 1 year horizon.

Method : Model developed based on Weight of Evidence method. Fine classing and Coarse Classing done for all the continuous and categorical variables .Initially the variables with very low IV/predictive power were dropped from the model. Categories or groups of the variables were replaced by their corresponding WOE values. Total population was split into 70% development and 30% validation sample.By running logistic regression in SAS on the development sample, the significant variables were  selected for the model. Logistic equation for the final significant variables was run on the validation sample to validate the model.
                        Inference : Performance metrics , KS was 37.8 and there was no break in the rank ordering which  indicates the model is efficient . Actual and predicted log odds were quite close with little under prediction in the last decile. KS was 36 for the validation sample which indicates the model validates well on the validation sample.

Tools: SAS , Excel.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Financial Integration and Economic Growth: A Panel Data Analysis in BRICS Nation
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Objective: Study the financial integration among the BRICS nations for the period March 2004 to March 2016 using time series and panel econometric techniques.
